name: Dalao: A New Beginning
description: When Holling receives a notice from his master Mr. Denny, his life turns upside down. Dalao: A New Beginning is fast paced and is really fun to play. Holling is set out on a mission to rescue other soldiers in the current war in China Town. There he encounters friends, pandas, enemy's, traitors, chicken lizards, a creepy lady who sells you stuff and much more. This game is created by RPG Maker MV and the people at Press B Studios.
